basics.name: Anas Bellaouali
basics.label: Mathematical Researcher & Educator
basics.summary: Dual-career professional blending advanced Computational Mathematics with passionate Pedagogy. Dedicated to bridging the gap between complex algorithmic theory and accessible, student-centered learning. Experienced in numerical analysis, optimization, and developing educational technologies.

work.name: Teaching Experience
work.summary: Delivering comprehensive mathematics curriculum with a focus on conceptual understanding and real-world application.
highlights: Implementing differentiated instruction strategies to support diverse learning styles.
Integrating technology into lesson plans to visualize complex mathematical concepts.

work.name: Teaching Experience
work.summary: Assisted in curriculum delivery and student support, gaining foundational pedagogical experience.
highlights: Collaborated with senior faculty to develop engaging instructional materials.
Provided one-on-one tutoring to students requiring additional support.

work.name: Research & Technical Work
work.summary: Conducted advanced research in Computational Mathematics, focusing on filtering algorithms and optimization.
highlights: Final Research Project: Kalman Filtering applications.
Developed numerical simulations to validate theoretical models.

work.name: Research & Technical Work
work.summary: Project-based role focusing on algorithmic visualization.
highlights: TSP Algorithm Visualization Project: created interactive tools to demonstrate optimization processes.

projects.name: Advanced Kalman Filtering and Smoothing
projects.summary: A comprehensive research project exploring state estimation in noisy systems.
highlights: Implemented Extended Kalman Filter (EKF) for non-linear systems.
Analyzed smoothing techniques to improve historical data accuracy.

projects.name: TSP Optimization Algorithm Visualization
projects.summary: An interactive dashboard visualizing the Traveling Salesperson Problem.
highlights: Visualized genetic algorithms and simulated annealing approaches.
Designed to be used as an educational tool for explaining NP-hard problems.
Built with Python and visualization libraries.

projects.name: Educational Data Analytics Toolkit
projects.summary: A suite of tools designed to analyze student performance data.
highlights: Key pedagogical tool identifying learning gaps.
Automated reporting for personalized student feedback.
Integrates research-grade statistics into classroom management.
